column4: Hi, using Ubuntu, Edgy, on my Hp Pavillion notebook dv2125nr, broadcom LAN. i have another machine, connected to the same LAN. --> Problem: When i type a webpage in my brower (Firefox) it take a lot 'looking the address, but  from windows it doesnt.. it runs easy. i have ADSL 768 KBPS
are you using the same DNS server in Linux as you're in Windows?
Yes, is the same DNS servers.
you shouldn't have third-party repos enabled when upgrading.
